i feel exhausted from life tryna find a drive and it dont help im stressed out from this 9 to 5 but im still tryna thrive looking for my way out really cause i aint tryna live with mama till im 35 i fully feel jaded i aint made it and despite a little love i think how many people hate it but fuck it it aint for them to appreciate it if i waited for everybody to love it then i would die and never make it i remember being faded in the club the first night we heard fresh come on we seen the dj when he played it theres nothing like it except that moment where i make it but then i stop and think how many almost made it maybe fame is overrated or maybe ill make it at last see im just waiting on my break like cracked glass just tryna live before i go out dressed as i breathe in marijuana and i blow out stress
